text: The flag of San Juan de los Lagos () It is colored blue and white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code Bright Blue #0096FF White #FFFFFF ==References== San Juan de los Lagos Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of San Juan de los Lagos
